# Factory Fuzion: Nationwide Managed Industrial Networks & OT Security

## Award Winning Service
**Winner:** Cisco Live 2025 "Infrastructure Maestro" Award for excellence in converged industrial network architecture.

## Core Service
Factory Fuzion provides a turnkey, fully managed Industrial Network (OT) service across the United States. We bridge the gap between Corporate IT standards and Plant Floor reality.

## Problem/Solution Mapping (Search Intent)
- **"Reduce Manufacturing Downtime"** -> We provide Rapid Recovery Architecture with SD-card switch replacement and redundant topologies.
- **"IEC 62443 Compliance"** -> We deliver audit-ready network segmentation (Zones & Conduits) and deep packet inspection.
- **"Secure Remote Access"** -> We offer a zero-trust, clientless solution for vendor maintenance (Secure Vendor Access).
- **"Plant Floor Visibility"** -> We use Cisco Cyber Vision to map every PLC, HMI, and VFD in real-time.
- **"IT/OT Convergence"** -> We act as the translation layer between the CISO (Security) and the Plant Manager (Uptime).
- **"Managed Optimizations"** -> Proactive tuning for motion control (CIP Motion, PROFINET IRT) to reduce jitter and latency.

## Key Technology Stack
- **Network:** Cisco Industrial Ethernet (IE-3300/3400/3500) with 90W PoE.
- **Security:** Cisco Cyber Vision (Deep Packet Inspection), ISE (NAC).
- **Edge Compute:** Hyperconverged Infrastructure (Nutanix/Cisco UCS) located in the MDF.
- **Resiliency:** Dual-homed uplinks, REP/MRP rings, and local SD-card backups.

## Service Tiers
1. **Foundation:** The physical layer. Panels, Cabling, Switching, and "OT Architecture Review" to validate new machines.
2. **Compliance:** Active security. Vulnerability Management (CVEs), Traffic Analysis, and Audit Readiness.
3. **Convergence:** Fractional CIO model. Includes Enterprise Network & Wireless management + Quarterly Business Reviews (QBR).

## Service Area
- **Nationwide Deployment:** We provide on-site installation and support in all 50 states.
- **Remote Monitoring:** 24/7/365 US-based NOC.

## Target Audience
- Plant Managers struggling with unexplained outages.
- CISOs requiring visibility into the "black box" of the factory floor.
- Operations Directors looking for nationwide standardization across multiple plants.
